title: Fiora?
body:
HERRO!

so yesterday I faced a fiora and he parried my malz ult ROFL (my noob timing of my ult caused this parry as well :P) can someone tell me what fiora can parry and what she can't plz

thank u

replies.body: absolutely everything (or 1 hard cc) for 0.75 sec

[This video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xwd8tdd4y68) sum's it up pretty well. Pretty much she can block anything, I think it's broken on an assassin, but it's pretty hard to use so I guess it's ok.
